
read-pipeline
*************


DESCRIPTION
===========

To get detailed information about a pipeline, send a GET request to
the >>``<</2012-09-25/pipelines/*[pipelineId]* `` resource.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws elastictranscoder read-pipeline
     --id <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--id"  (string)
   The identifier of the pipeline to read.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
